ChatGPT 在回答有关结直肠癌的问题方面能否胜过专家？ ChatGPT 回答结直肠癌 (CRC) 相关问题的熟练程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Can-ChatGPT-outperform-an-expert-in-answering-questions-about-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Can-ChatGPT-outperform-an-expert-in-answering-questions-about-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66994125-4842-49d6-8933-00230df040f5 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 06:09:00 -0500 Can ChatGPT outperform an expert in answering questions about colorectal cancer?
半月板覆盖提供了痛苦的盘状外侧半月板的线索凭借当今医疗保健领域可用的所有出色的成像技术，临床医生能够使用非侵入性成像以极高的准确性诊断组织和关节畸形。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Meniscal-coverage-offers-clue-to-painful-discoid-terior-meniscus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Meniscal-coverage-offers-clue-to-painful-discoid-terior-meniscus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cd0fb27-4981-425b-97ad-5adc2f8ca2a0 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 06:00:00 -0500 Meniscal coverage offers clue to painful discoid lateral meniscus
新分析表明空气污染与心血管疾病相关死亡之间存在联系最近对几乎所有世界卫生组织成员国的数据进行的分析清楚地表明了空气污染与心血管疾病死亡率之间的联系，与高收入国家相比，低收入国家与空气污染相关的死亡人数更多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/New-analysis-demonstrates-a-link- Between-air-pollution-and-cardioangio-disease-lated-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/New-analysis-demonstrates-a-link- Between-air-pollution-and-cardioangio-disease-lated-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=137b296b-7091-4668-85a2-c27f61f4bdad Wed, 07 Feb 2024 05:55:21 -0500 New analysis demonstrates a link between air pollution and cardiovascular disease-related deaths

科罗拉多州采取行动将农业工人与心理健康资源联系起来科罗拉多州立法者提出了两项​​措施，他们称这将改善该州农业的心理健康资源的可用性，因为牧场主和农场工人的压力、焦虑和抑郁已成为自冠状病毒大流行以来不断恶化的关键问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Colorado-moves-to-connect-agriculture-workers-with-mental-health-resources.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Colorado-moves-to-connect-agriculture-workers-with-mental-health-resources.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2daecc64-3429-4105-bd97-1e1076433b5f Wed, 07 Feb 2024 05:42:08 -0500 Colorado moves to connect agricultural workers with mental health resources
